status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Description 
Test upside down orientation.

h3. Steps to reproduce issue 
On Android: 
1) Launch OrientationModes/upsideDownOnly app 

On iOS: 
1) Hold device in portrait mode and launch OrientationModes/upsideDownOnly app 
2) Hold device with top pointing left 
3) Hold device upside down 
4) Hold device with top pointing right

h3. Expected result 
Android Results:
App appears upside down portrait.

iOS Results:
After Step 1) Image appears in upside down portrait mode 
After Step 2) Image appears in upside down portrait mode 
After Step 3) Image appears in upside down portrait mode 
After Step 4) Image appears in upside down portrait mode

h3. Actual result 
upsideDownOnly app crashes on launching it to iphone.

Test run: http://appcelerator.testlodge.com/projects/1317/test_runs/8386#executed_case_162285
